title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.18 - Peddling, sales, etc
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.18 - Peddling, sales, etc

State Regulations

The offering, selling, hiring or leasing of any goods, wares, merchandise or services, whether or not such services are to be rendered
for compensation, or for the purpose of distributing samples, pamphlets or
advertising matter of any sort within the parkway system, is
prohibited. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
182.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
